question: Indian ranks ____________ largest producer of crude steel as per the report of Steel Users Federation of India.
explanation: India has overtaken Japan to become the world's second-largest producer of crude steel in February, according to the Steel Users Federation of India. At present, China is the largest producer of crude steel in the world. India overtook the US in 2015 to become the third largest producer of crude steel. India produced 8.4 million tonnes of crude steel in February 2018.
